attributes.action: Make it illegal for women to wear heels in an exam hall to stop distraction.
attributes.background: I'm quite sure many of you have been sat there trying to do you test in a hall, and have had a female teacher stroll around the hall with heels on which make an irritating noise which is possible to distract and cause you to loose focus and get a worse grade. Sign if you agree this should be stopped

rejection.details: The arrangements in exam halls are the responsibility of the school or other institution where the exam is being held, not the Government or Parliament.
